pullRequest.title: Additional utilities for working with test accounts.
pullRequest.bodyText:
There are two of these.
One to get the AppInfo object, and since the temp accounts are only used in the "cloud" space I wasn't sure how much flexibility they needed.
One to get the tempUser for a given user type and allow a consumer to act on it.

commit.message: Additional utilities for working with test accounts.

nodes.bodyText: Would probably be better to accept each of these as method parameters instead of hard coding here
Why duplicate all of these as enums? Are the String constants in LabConstants.java not sufficient?
Do we really need this method? Is the one below not sufficient?
Synced offline...let's make sure if this Consumer is needed...if not, then let's remove it

commit.message: Go ahead and use the new semantic UserType.
